stories.title: UK pledges to train thousands of Ukrainian troops

stories.text:
Hello hackers!

I'm putting together a legal operating system for small businesses/startups based on Notion.

Am targeting three key solutions:

First is self-serve contract repository that enable business teams to initiate simple contracts from templates.

The second is a task manager and review checklists that enables users to follow through simple contract lifecycle steps.

The third is a contract management database template to keep track of your executed agreements

Also planning to include model SOPs and a Corporate Wiki to store important corporation records.

Running a business is hard. Attorneys are expensive. This will make it easier.

Would love to connect with interested Founders/Owners/Operators (even in-house lawyers) to validate

If this is you, please reach out at avc@lexhustle.com. Will provide a free version to the first 10 volunteers.
stories.title: Manage Your Day-to-Day Legal Process in Notion
